divs: Sighting DetailsHi it is 5:43 AM may 22nd 2012 I work the night shift working with concrete. my co workers and i were drilling on the 4th view on ramp heading west toward the HRBT when a bright light flashed overhead. We watched as it headed for the horizon at an unearthly speed and the light that the object seemed to be pulse as if for a thrust and a ring and aura apeared and i personally feel if it were traveling or ready to travel at the speed of light it seemed as if a wormhole or path opened up from the path it traveled. It moved so quickly that it seemed to crash down but i feel it was flying through the round horizon west bound
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Norfolk
There were no other sightings in Norfolk on or around May 21st 2012
Summary: Working graveyard by the HRBT co-workers and I witness a vehicle from beyond
